segments.text: Could you just run through the evacuation procedure ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , of course . When you hear the fire alarm , which is a very loud , continuous ringing noise , you should go to the nearest fire exit or fire escape as quickly as possible .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , don't use the lifts . We have regular fire drills so you'll soon become familiar with the procedure . And always shut the fire doors to prevent the fire spreading .
segments.speaker: S2
